game.name: Balkan Shop Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: “Balkan Shop Simulator” lets you manage your own store in the Balkans – stock shelves, serve customers, and grow your businesses. From a small local shop to a thriving retail chain, success depends on your skills!
game.shortDescriptionEn: “Balkan Shop Simulator” lets you manage your own store in the Balkans – stock shelves, serve customers, and grow your businesses. From a small local shop to a thriving retail chain, success depends on your skills!
